display_name: Overall non-supine Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >=4% desaturation
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 4% desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hrop4 +   hnrop4 + carop4 + canop4 + oarop4 + oanop4 + marop4 + manrop4)/(remepop+nremepop)
